headline: A Year Later, American Rescue Plan Dollars Foster Learning in Ohio
author: Mary Kuhlman
sentences: Ohio's Rescue Plan dollars supported the academic, social and emotional needs of students and educators, as well as resources and connectivity for remote and hybrid learning.
